content.raw:
The system has many moving parts that all need to be synchronized in order to even start development of the controllers. The proposal is to do this work only once for all participants instead of requiring each participant to redo the same work \(=build working docker image with all compatible packages installed\). It would be great to have a daily updates to the prebuilt image that are known to be working \(tested in-house\) and containing the latest developments.

There would be only one distribution channel - the prebuilt docker image - instead of the current many \(apt packages, subt repo, wget some  tar from web…\).
content.html:
The system has many moving parts that all need to be synchronized in order to even start development of the controllers. The proposal is to do this work only once for all participants instead of requiring each participant to redo the same work (=build working docker image with all compatible packages installed). It would be great to have a daily updates to the prebuilt image that are known to be working (tested in-house) and containing the latest developments.

There would be only one distribution channel - the prebuilt docker image - instead of the current many (apt packages, subt repo, wget some tar from web…).
